sources.title: Henry's Crime | FULL MOVIE | 2010 | Keanu Reeves | Comedy, Drama, Crime
sources.description:
After having survived three years in prison for a bank robbery he did not commit, an amiable, but aimless man, played by Keanu Reeves, decides to rob the bank for real.

Director: Malcolm Venville
2010
Starring Keanu Reeves, Judy Greer, Vera Farmiga, James Caan, Peter Stormare
Edited for youtube ad standards

metadata.Plot: Released from prison for a crime he didn't commit, an ex-con targets the same bank he was sent away for robbing.
metadata.Writer: Sacha Gervasi, David N. White, Stephen Hamel
metadata.Actors: Keanu Reeves, Vera Farmiga, James Caan
